title: WTB: N172 Old Judge Jimmy Ryan
author: AK11

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 Old Judge Jimmy Ryan
posts.post_content:
Looking for any N172 Old Judge Jimmy Ryan, raw or graded. Even though he is not a HOFer, his stats were great in his era so I am looking around for one. Anyone here that can help me locate one would be greatly appreciated. Thanks,

Andrew

I have this one. $195 delivered - prefer not to take PayPal.
Best, Kevin
I appreciate the offer, but I'll pass on this one. Gorgeous front, but I'd prefer a more clean back. Was that one out of an album? Thank though.
No problem. Yeah, I am sure that it was in an album. The card was already graded when I got it, so I do not know its history beyond that.
Nice looking contrast on that one, Kevin.

Nice looking card and a good price.  FWIW, the 1888 re-issues such as this example are tougher to find than the 1887 originals but you'd have to find a Chicago or Jimmy Ryan fanatic to appreciate the variation rarity.
